application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Works to Oak tree protected by ENF ORDER NO 18 1963: (T1) 3m reduction, re-balance and re-shape tree.
decision_conditions: The Council does not consider that the grounds specified by the applicant/agent (i.e. "oversized" and overhanging the road etc) sufficient reason to justify the proposed detrimental crown reduction of a mature and prominent tree of significant amenity that makes a positive contribution to the amenity of the locality and wider borough.

The proposed works conflicts with the recommendations in BS3998:2010, by removing too much leaf bearing structure "there should still be a strong framework of healthy small diameter and twigs (leaf bearing structure) capable of producing dense leaf cover during the following growing season".

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: LHA Maximum Height Level: All buildings, structures, and works exceeding 150 metres in height (492.1 feet).
LLA Maximum height level: All buildings, structures, and works exceeding 150 metres in height (492.1 feet)
